activities.name: Art workshops span a variety of mediums and interests and are a great way to connect with your community and learn new skills.  Workshops have a special withdraw policy. No refunds for withdrawals 7 days or less prior to course start date.
activities.rawText: Art workshops span a variety of mediums and interests and are a great way to connect with your community and learn new skills.  Workshops have a special withdraw policy. No refunds for withdrawals 7 days or less prior to course start date.

activities.name: This camp is for children who will complete Grade 4,5,6 or 7 in June 2025. Please visit nvrc.ca/refunds for the refund policy.  1. Must have completed Grade 4 to Grade 7 in the school year 2024/25. 2. Clients requesting Affordable Child Care Benefit (formally Child Care Subsidy) from the Ministry of Children and Family Development must make an appointment with Holly W. Koda, immediately. All applicants should refer to www.myfamilyservices.gov.bc.ca for ACCB/Child Care Subsidy procedures.  This Camp is licensed by VCH. Parents must create a Family Profile by registering through the registration link (will be provided via email) after this registration. All parents will be asked to download an APP that will be used to sign-in/-out children on the day and to communicate with staff.  Children that require extra support at school, will require extra support at camp! After registration, please contact Holly W. Koda at 604.983.6385 to confirm funding and staffing are in place. If we don't receive confirmation or any necessary information, Parkgate Society reserves the right to withdraw the child, as we cannot ensure proper care and staffing without it.
